data.question: What is the proton conductivity of the 3D lanthanide(III) metal–organic framework at 75°C and 97% RH?
What property allows metal–organic frameworks (MOFs) to be considered for proton-conducting materials?
data.answer: Their defined structure provides insight into the proton-conduction pathway and mechanism.

data.question: True or False: The lanthanide metal–organic frameworks (LnMOFs) cannot emit light in the primary color range.
What method was used to achieve tunable color emission in LnMOFs?
What is the activation energy estimated for EuL according to the Arrhenius plots?
True or False: The proton conduction in LnMOFs is abundant and well-explored.
What is the main advantage of MOFs as proton-conducting materials?
data.answer: Their highly designable nature enables the tunability of MOF structures.

data.question: True or False: The emission spectra of the Eu–Tb codoped MOF can be tuned from green to red by varying the Eu(III)/Tb(III) ratio.
What is the geometry around the Eu3+ ion in the EuL complex?
True or False: The proton transport in the LnMOFs occurs without the aid of a moving 'vehicle'.
How can white light emission be achieved in LnMOFs?
data.answer: By precise control of the proportion of Dy–Eu and Dy–Sm in the Gd analog.

data.question: What is the longest luminescence lifetime and highest quantum yield reported among the LnLs?
data.answer: TbL has the longest lifetime of 653 ms and highest quantum yield of 42.2%

data.question: True or False: The LnMOFs discussed have been previously reported to show both proton conductivity and tunable emission.
What is the role of free water molecules in the proton conduction mechanism of LnMOFs?
data.answer: Free water molecules accept protons forming H3O+, which move along one definite direction.

data.question: True or False: The LnMOFs can only conduct protons at high temperatures.
What is the main challenge in obtaining proton-conducting LnMOFs?
data.answer: Proton conduction in LnMOFs is scarce to date.

data.question: True or False: The LnMOFs are expected to be used in developing sensors and other devices.
What is the estimated activation energy for DyL?
How are the double-chains in the EuL structure arranged?
data.answer: Along two different directions and cross-linked through Eu–O covalent bonds to a 3D impact structure.

data.question: True or False: The LnMOFs' structure and functionality are not influenced by the doping of other elements.
